translation.en: And I'm pretty sure I'm a psychopath.
translation.ja: 間違いなくサイコパスだ

translation.en: [James] I was eight when I realized I didn't have a sense of humor.
translation.ja: ８歳で冗談は苦手だと気づく

translation.en: [man] Why doesn't the Queen wave with this hand?
Eh? Why doesn't the Queen wave with this hand?
translation.ja: なぜこの手を振らない？

translation.en: I'd always wanted to punch my dad in the face.
When I was nine, he bought a deep-fat fryer. He saw it on an American shopping channel.
translation.ja: ９歳の時 父さんが通販でフライヤーを買った

translation.en: One day, I put my hand in it.
translation.ja: ある日 手を入れてみた

translation.en: I wanted to make myself feel something.
translation.ja: 何かを感じたかったからだ

translation.en: When I was 15, I put my neighbor's cat in a box and took it into the woods.
translation.ja: 15歳の時 近所の猫を森に連れて行った

translation.en: After that, I killed more animals.
translation.ja: それで欲求に火が付いた

translation.en: And I remember every single one.
translation.ja: 獲物は１匹残らず覚えている

translation.en: [James] School was beneath me, but it was a good place for observation and selection
translation.ja: 学校はくだらないけど品定めには最適の場所だ

translation.en: I was gonna kill something bigger,
[Alyssa] I get these moments when I have to lie down because everything feels, sort of, too much.
translation.ja: 爆発しそうな時私はこうやって寝転ぶ

translation.en: And I look up and see the blue or the grey or the black
translation.ja: 青やグレーや黒の空を見てると―

translation.en: and I feel myself melting into it.
translation.ja: 吸い込まれそうになる

translation.en: And for, like, a split second, I feel free and happy.
translation.ja: ほんの一瞬 自由でハッピーな気分になれる

translation.en: [woman whispers] Your presence is required, young lady.
Why are you talking like Downton Abbey?
[Alyssa] My mum used to be nice, but then she divorced my dad and met...
translation.ja: ママは離婚しあの男に会って変わった

translation.en: Last week, he said he thought I needed a bigger bra.
translation.ja: ブラにまで口出しするから―

translation.en: So I threw a Chicken Kiev at his head.
translation.ja: チキンを投げつけてやった

translation.en: Mum pretended that she hadn't heard him.
translation.ja: ママは聞こえないフリ

translation.en: Now she has the perfect house and the perfect garden in the perfect neighborhood... with perfect twins.
translation.ja: 完璧な家と庭 それに完璧な双子に満足なご様子

translation.en: Well... their heads do smell nice, though.
translation.ja: まあ… 赤ん坊の頭はいい匂いだけどね

translation.en: I haven't see my dad since I was eight.
He never fitted in. He couldn't settle. So he had to leave.
translation.ja: パパは人付き合いがヘタで出てった

translation.en: I don't blame him. But he sends me a card, without fail, every single birthday.
translation.ja: 恨んでないのに誕生日には必ずカードが届く
パパの気持ちも分かる

translation.en: I don't trust people who fit in.
translation.ja: 八方美人は信用できない
目の前にいるんだけど

translation.en: [Alyssa] I'm not saying he's the answer,
translation.ja: 話す意味なんてないかも

translation.en: [James] Alyssa was new. She'd started that term.
translation.ja: アリッサは転校してきたばかりだ

translation.en: I thought she could be interesting to kill.
translation.ja: 彼女なら殺してみたい

translation.en: [James] So I pretended to fall in love with her.

translation.ja: 電話 持ってないの

translation.en: I don't have a phone either.
[James] I knew that people in love went out on dates.
translation.ja: 恋してる奴らはデートする

translation.en: Do you wanna go on a date?
Hi, what can I get for you today?
"One of the top 10 greatest American dining experiences"?
-Uh-- -I will have a... banana split with extra cherries.
translation.ja: バナナスプリットにチェリーを追加
ブルーベリー･パンケーキ

translation.en: And a hot chocolate with cream.
translation.ja: ココアのクリーム乗せ

translation.en: [giggles insincerely] And an extra fucking spoon.
Sorry. You can't use language like that, otherwise I'm gonna have to ask you and your boyfriend to leave.
translation.ja: 汚い言葉は使わないで２人とも帰ってもらうわよ

translation.en: I will have... a great big banana shit
translation.ja: じゃあ…デカいクソバナナに―

translation.en: with extra fucking cherries all on top of it.
translation.ja: クソチェリーを乗せて

translation.en: OK, sorry, that's it. Right. [shouts] Marvin!
translation.ja: もう いいわ マーヴィン！
上等よ　マーヴィンにさっさと作らせて

translation.en: See if Marvin can make a banana split for me, you fucking cunt!
translation.ja: 上等よ　マーヴィンにさっさと作らせて このクソ女！
じゃあね　マーヴィン！

translation.en: [James] It seemed that Alyssa had some issues.
translation.ja: 彼女は病んでるみたいだ

translation.en: I think we live in the most boring town on the planet.
translation.ja: 地球上で一番退屈な町だよね

translation.en: Well, they've got money. They feel safe.
translation.ja: みんな 金にしか興味ないんだ

translation.en: She's the only cool person in this town.
translation.ja: 町で唯一 イケてる人だ
あの人？ うん　いろいろやってる

translation.en: and had, like, 15 abortions when it was illegal or something.
translation.ja: 中絶が違法の時代に15回は おろしてる

translation.en: Can we go to your house?
Why do you live in such a weird house?
translation.ja: 何でこんな家に住んでんの？
いいね　あんたママ似

translation.en: -This is pretty retro. -I don't like it.
translation.ja: レトロだね 嫌いなんだ

translation.en: [James] Alyssa was kind of a nymphomaniac.
translation.ja: 彼女は好きものっぽい

translation.en: I tell you what. I've never been sure if he even, you know...
translation.ja: こいつは抜いてもいないかと…

translation.en: I always thought there was something wrong with him!
[James] I actually masturbated once a week for medical purposes.
translation.ja: 実際は健康のため週一で抜いてた

translation.en: I knew it wasn't good to let things build up.
I thought probably he was gay.

translation.ja: 彼はアセクシャルかも

translation.en: We're dealing with a really broad spectrum these days.
translation.ja: 最近は いろんな人がいる
あんたのパパ 最低

translation.en: Sometimes, I feel like punching him in the face.
Have you ever eaten a pussy before?
translation.ja: アソコなめたことある？

translation.en: [James] It was important to be confident in moments like this.
translation.ja: こんな時は堂々とするべきだ

translation.en: I want you to eat mine.
Actually, I was ready at ten.
It was important to work out the exact logistics beforehand.
translation.ja: 事前の綿密な計画が重要だ

translation.en: When it got to 12, I started to think she might not be coming.
translation.ja: 12時になり彼女の言葉を疑い始めた

translation.en: [Alyssa] Sometimes, I worry that I ruin things.
I feel comfortable with him. Sort of safe.
translation.ja: 彼といると落ち着くすごく安心する

translation.en: Put these on and come downstairs.

translation.ja: 何で？ パーティーよ

translation.en: No way, I told you. I'm going out.
[whispers] I am not having this argument again, Alyssa.
Please, love. I want you to be there. For me.
translation.ja: お願いよ私のためだと思って

translation.en: Right. Those aren't for you. Hand them round.
translation.ja: あなたが食べてどうするの

translation.en: This is a load of bullshit.
Oh, well, if you hate it so much...
You look good when you make an effort, don't you?
[Alyssa] Sometimes, everything is suddenly really simple.
translation.ja: 突然 霧が晴れることがある

translation.en: It's like everything shifts in a moment.
translation.ja: 一瞬ですべてが変わる感覚

translation.en: And you step out of your body,
You step out and you see where you are really clearly.
translation.ja: 自分のいた場所を俯瞰(ふかん)すると分かる
こんな生活 クソくらえ

translation.en: [Alyssa] I think being angry and sad at the same time really turns me on.
translation.ja: 怒りと悲しみが同時に来るとしたくなる

translation.en: [Alyssa] I think I could fall in love with him.
translation.ja: 彼なら好きになれそう

translation.en: [James] I wondered if it'd be easier to slit her throat if I flipped her round.
translation.ja: ノドを切るにはうつ伏せにすべきか

translation.en: Whether it would be better not to see her face,
translation.ja: 顔は見ないほうがいいか

translation.en: -What? -I'm serious. Let's leave this shithole town. Now.
translation.ja: こんな町 さっさと出ようよ

translation.en: You hate it. I hate it. Our parents are dickheads. You've got a car.
translation.ja: お互いこの町が嫌い親はクズ　車もある
父さんのだ あんなクソ野郎

translation.en: I'm going, whether you come with me or not. Are you in?
translation.ja: 私は行く　あんたは？

translation.en: [James] I figured... I wasn't in a rush.
translation.ja: 殺すのは後でもいいか

translation.en: [James] I didn't know where we were going, or when I was gonna kill her,
translation.ja: 先のことは何も分からない

translation.en: but I punched my dad in the face and stole his car.
translation.ja: でも父さんを殴って車を盗んだ

translation.en: And that felt like a good place to start.
